patthana13.2:1.1_0: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—sukhāya
patthana13.2:1.1_1: vedanāya sampayutte khandhe paṭicca sukhavedanā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ;
patthana13.2:1.1_3: (Mahābhūtā natthi.) Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo
patthana13.2:1.1_4: uppajjati hetupaccayā—sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca
patthana13.2:1.1_6: sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.2:1.1_7: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.2:1.1_8: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya
patthana13.2:1.1_10: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.2:1.1_11: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto
patthana13.2:1.1_12: ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.2:2.1_0: Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.2:2.1_1: Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.2:2.1_2: Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.2:2.1_3: Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya
patthana13.2:2.1_5: Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya
patthana13.2:2.1_7: Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.2:2.1_8: Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto
patthana13.2:2.1_9: ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.2:3.1_0: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.2:3.1_1: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.2:3.1_2: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.2:3.1_3: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca naadukkhamasukhāya
patthana13.2:3.1_4: vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.2:3.1_5: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca naadukkhamasukhāya
patthana13.2:3.1_6: vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.2:3.1_7: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nadukkhāya vedanāya
patthana13.2:3.1_9: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nadukkhāya vedanāya
patthana13.2:3.1_10: sampayutto ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.2:4.1_0: Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe ekavīsa …pe… purejāte āsevane cuddasa …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
patthana13.2:5.1_0: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana13.2:8.1_0: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana13.2:8.1_1: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana13.2:8.1_2: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana13.2:8.1_3: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana13.2:8.1_4: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana13.2:8.1_5: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa ca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana13.2:8.1_6: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa ca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa
patthana13.2:8.1_7: ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana13.2:9.1_0: Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe ekavīsa …pe… avigate ekavīsa. (Pañhāvāraṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.)
